Texts.Chs: 我已经打开了你的油漆工具。^green;油漆工具可以为许多不同的块着色。
Texts.Eng: I have switched on your Paint Tool. ^green;The Paint Tool enables you to colour many different blocks.

Texts.Chs: 油漆工具可以让你为许多块涂上不同的颜色。我可以为你开启它。
Texts.Eng: The Paint Tool allows you to colour many blocks different colours. I can enable it for you.
